title: will i lose lp if....
body: so if i dont play ranked for a while will i lose lp? or is it just if i dont play league for a while bcuz my pc is broken and it needs repair so just wondering if i will lose lp over this time? someone please enlighten me.

replies.body: depends on what rank you are; if you're in platinum or above yeah, you'll decay and if you're really high you'll decay very quickly (though i doubt you are challenger if you don't already know this). In bronze-silver-gold you have nothing to worry about and you might just not be visible in the rankings but you should stay at your current ranking until the end of season where everyone gets a soft reset. Quoting riot 'Decay does not occur for players in Bronze, Silver, and Gold.'. Read more on riots [Ranked FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ).
thanks sm, exactly what i needed to know dude. Cheers <3
